NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Football and Sponsorship or the cell corresponding to Movies and Streaming Hours?

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Events and Revenue or the cell corresponding to Media Rights and Streaming Hours?

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Media Rights and Social Media or the cell corresponding to Movies and Social Media?

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Basketball and Royalties or the cell corresponding to Basketball and Social Media?
